participant_1.name: Charlotte
participant_1.personality: Sociable, elegant, and a bit dramatic. Enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_1.background:
I like drinking expensive wine.
I own a french bulldog.
I once lost a diamond at a debutante ball.
I like getting my nails done.
I am unemployed and living off a trust fund.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Playful, imaginative, and down-to-earth. Loves to explore and share ideas.
participant_2.background:
I believe that mermaids are real.
I am terrified of heights.
I have four sisters.
I love iced tea.

content.text: Hi there, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to drink iced tea, read books, and play video games.
I like to drink expensive wine, get my nails done, and go to the opera.
I've never been to the opera. What's it like?
It's amazing! The music is beautiful and the costumes are incredible.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm unemployed. I live off a trust fund.
Really? That's awesome! I'm always jealous of people who don't have to work.
It's not always as great as it sounds. I get bored a lot.
I can understand that. But it sounds like you have a lot of time to do the things you love.
Yeah, I do. I love spending time with my dog, reading, and getting my nails done.
Sounds like you have a great life.
I do, thanks. I'm glad I met you.
Me too. It's been nice talking to you.
